SEARCH
Package interactable

Interface Interactable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BigPotions, Classic, Dragon, Ennemies, Epee, FireBall, Goblin, LightningBolt, OffensiveEquipment, Potions, Sledgehammer, SmallPotions, Witch
public interface Interactable
The Interactable interface defines a contract for objects that can interact with a character and a menu in the game. Any class implementing this interface must provide an implementation for the interact method.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    interact(Character character, Menu menu)
    Performs an interaction with a character using the provided menu.

  • Method Details

    • interact

      void interact(Character character, Menu menu)
      Performs an interaction with a character using the provided menu.
      Parameters:
      character - the Character instance representing the player
      menu - the Menu instance used for user interactions
